termsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
intro: Welcome to The Calaris. By accessing or using our website https://thecalaris.com/, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms & Conditions.
If you do not agree, please refrain from using our Website or services.

sections.heading: About Us
sections.content: The Calaris provides interior design and execution services across India. All services are offered on a non-exclusive, project-based engagement.

sections.heading: Scope of Services
content: The scope of services includes interior design, planning, and execution as mutually agreed with the client through proposals, estimates, drawings, or written communication.
Any additional or modified services will be charged separately upon client approval.

sections.heading: Payments & Pricing
points: Project estimates are indicative and may change based on design revisions, material selection, or site conditions.
Payments are milestone-based and communicated before project initiation.
All prices are exclusive of applicable taxes unless stated otherwise.
Advance payments once made are non-refundable unless explicitly agreed in writing.

sections.heading: Project Timelines
sections.content: Design and execution timelines are approximate and may vary due to:
sections.note: The Calaris is not responsible for delays caused by clients, builders, vendors, or force majeure events.

sections.heading: Client Responsibilities
points: Provide timely approvals, information, and site access
Ensure necessary permissions from builders or authorities
Make payments as per agreed milestones
sections.note: Delays caused by the client may impact timelines and costs.

sections.heading: Warranty
points: Lifetime warranty applies only to workmanship and materials supplied by The Calaris, subject to normal usage.
Warranty does not cover wear and tear, misuse, third-party products, or unauthorized modifications.
Electrical appliances and fittings are covered as per respective manufacturer warranties.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All designs, drawings, concepts, and visual content created by The Calaris remain its intellectual property unless otherwise agreed in writing. Clients may use designs only for the executed project and must not reproduce or distribute them commercially.

sections.heading: Use of Images & Portfolio
sections.content: The Calaris reserves the right to photograph completed projects and use them for marketing, portfolio, and promotional purposes. Client identity details will remain confidential unless permitted.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
points: Structural, electrical, plumbing, or civil issues outside agreed scope
sections.note: Maximum liability, if any, shall not exceed the amount paid by the client for the services.

sections.heading: Confidentiality
sections.content: Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of sensitive project, pricing, and personal information shared during the engagement.

sections.heading: Termination
sections.content: Either party may terminate services in writing. Payments made until the termination date remain payable and non-refundable unless otherwise agreed.

sections.heading: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
content: These Terms are governed by the laws of India.
All disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Bangalore, Karnataka.

sections.heading: Changes to Terms
sections.content: The Calaris may update these Terms & Conditions at any time. Continued use of the Website implies acceptance of updated terms.
